trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand> event when a button within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> row field is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件都将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand>事件中的按钮时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>单击行字段。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemCommand> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以提供的事件处理程序每次此事件发生时执行的自定义的例程。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control also raises other specialized events when certain buttons are clicked (buttons with the `CommandName` property set to "Delete", "Insert", "Page", or "Update").
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件还将引发单击某些按钮时的其他专用的事件 (与按钮`CommandName`属性设置为"Delete"、"插入"、"页上，"或"更新")。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: When using one of these buttons, you should consider using one of the specialized events provided by the control (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleted> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>).
trans-unit.target: 在使用这些按钮之一时，应考虑使用该控件提供的专用事件之一 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleted>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleted>

trans-unit.source: A DetailsViewCommandEventArgs object is passed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: DetailsViewCommandEventArgs 对象传递给事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: If the button that raised the event has a command name or command argument value, you can use the DetailsViewCommandEventArgs object to determine these values.
trans-unit.target: 如果引发事件的按钮命令名称或命令自变量值，你可以使用 DetailsViewCommandEventArgs 对象以确定这些值。

trans-unit.source: To determine the command name and command argument of the button clicked, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定的命令名称和被单击按钮的命令参数，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>属性，分别。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control that raised the event by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>通过引发事件的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the DetailsViewCommandEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: DetailsViewCommandEventArgs 类的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs>的新实例

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|The object contained in the `commandSource` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: |属性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>属性的值中包含`originalArgs`参数。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>|中包含的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>属性的值`originalArgs`参数。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|中包含的对象`commandSource`参数。 | &1;> [!NOTE]&1;> 在引发事件时，主要由控件开发人员使用此构造函数。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: 该命令的源。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: 获取命令的源。

trans-unit.source: Use the CommandSource property to access the properties of the object that represents the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: 使用 CommandSource 属性访问表示命令的源对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, this will be the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control itself, and in other cases it will be the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，这将是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件本身，而在其他情况下它会<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>被单击的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> class that represents the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>表示命令的源类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control has handled the event.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否已经处理了事件。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` in the event handler to specify that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control should not handle the event because you are handling it in your code.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为`true`中指定的事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件不应处理该事件，因为在代码中处理。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data-bound event code was skipped or has finished running; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果数据绑定事件代码已跳过或已完成运行;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
